title: 请大佬们，帮忙看下报错
author: 爱亿
txt_content:
09:30:13 [警告] Plugin performed restricted action, please inform them to use pr
oper API methods: Illegal thread group access
java.security.AccessControlException: Plugin violation: Illegal thread group acc
ess
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeSecurityManager.checkRestricted(BungeeSecurityManag
er.java:39)
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeSecurityManager.checkAccess(BungeeSecurityManager.j
ava:62)
    at java.lang.ThreadGroup.checkAccess(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.init(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.init(Unknown Source)
    at java.lang.Thread.<init>(Unknown Source)
    at net.cubespace.Yamler.Metrics.start(Metrics.java:212)
    at net.cubespace.Yamler.YamlerPlugin.onEnable(YamlerPlugin.java:14)
    at net.md_5.bungee.api.plugin.PluginManager.enablePlugins(PluginManager.java
:220)
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeCord.start(BungeeCord.java:250)
    at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeCordLauncher.main(BungeeCordLauncher.java:54)
    at net.md_5.bungee.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:15)

replies.author: 南外丶仓鼠
replies.txt_content:
yamler插件的问题，请删除该插件
求采纳
